title: Lord of Summons! Sudden Mutation
Reincarnated as a Scumbag, I Use My Wife and Daughter to Prove Immortality
summary: A mighty Da Luo immortal, gravely wounded, descends to the mortal world and reincarnates into the body of the scumbag Jiang Tianchen. After a thousand years of being single, he encounters a gang trying to assault his wife and take his daughter — so he beats them down without mercy! If they’re dark, he’s darker! Anyone who comes will be drained dry, turning all enemies into cultivation resources for him, his wife, and his daughter on their path to immortality!

title: A Golden World to you
summary: Hinako, a girl who came from another world, made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis, and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako, it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world, and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However, when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild, Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church...

title: Ha Buk Paeng’s youngest son
summary:
Habuk Peng Family’s best strength, Peng Jihyuk heads to the Nakho Region to save his family that fell into destruction due to the attack of the Demon Sect, but everything was a trap. At the moment of death, he felt the wrath of being the only one left from his beloved family.

‘Again…if you give me a chance…!”

Peng Jihyuk, who thought he was dead, woke up in the body of Young Master Sa, of the Peng Family.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)

title: The Concept-Grasping Magical Genius
summary:
Pauline became a mother figure to Rowan, who had lost everything. After Pauline left, Rowan grieved her and awakened to a power called 'Mana'. What's more, Rowan could even see the Mana of other people! 

Through mana, even though he's apart from Pauline, he can always feel like she's with him...

One day, Rowan encounters a shocking sight of Pauline, who he believed had left for a noble family.

title: A Fortune-Telling Princess
summary:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title: The Eunuch’s Consort Rules the World
summary: [Adapted from webnovel of the same name] In her previous life, she was betrayed and died. After transmigrating, her lonely soul fell upon the body of Xiliang Mo who suffered the same fate. She vowed to make those who harmed her pay, one step at a time. Breaking the legs of her insidious sister, forcing her pretentious stepmother to die, betraying her callous father. An unscrupulous husband? Then she'll just abandon and leave him, remarrying. But why does that villainous eunuch prince insist on marrying her? Although you got the looks of a deity, you're still a eunuch! They force her to become a eunuch's wife, then she'll become the number one heinous tyrant wife!

title: After Improperly Licking a Dog, I Became a Billionaire
summary: Once a typical simp, Lin Xin’s life takes a drastic turn when he’s dumped and inherits a divine financial system—starting him off with a whopping trillion yuan! But there’s a twist: he can only spend this fortune on women. Stuck with this bizarre stipulation, Lin Xin is forced to navigate an unconventional and thrilling path to wealth and power, transforming from a mere simp to a legendary tycoon.

title: Deadly Strong
summary: In his previous life, Su Ye stood as the last survivor amidst the world’s ultimate cataclysmic battle, a poignant witness to the downfall of humanity. However, after his demise, he inexplicably awoke to find himself reborn ten years into the past. Faced with impending and unparalleled challenges, he is resolute in his determination to lead everyone to triumph!

title: The Last Adventurer
summary:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.

title: Grace In Wonderland
Mercenary Enrollment
summary:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?

title: The Villainous Husband I Killed Has Returned
summary:
After she killed her own husband, 3 years later in the last day of mourning...she found him standing on front of her asking...
"I don't remember dying, my lady! So why you wearing the mourning clothes?"

title: I Will Buy Divine Power With Money!
It’s not a case of being loved
summary: No summary available.

title: Regressing with the King’s Power
summary: In a world where one's worth is determined by how powerful their skill is, Taehyeon is 35, unawakened, and barely able to scrape by as a pack bearer for monster hunters. But when a mysterious being calling itself “the King” gives him a skill of his own, Taehyeon gets a second chance at life. Now he’s back in high school and armed with Gluttony, a skill that allows him to block and absorb the skills of others!

title: What Remains in the Damaged Place
The Fake Saint of a Reverse Harem Game
The Blooming Violet in the Back Garden
summary:
On the day the streets and flowers burn, Violeta, a kitchen assistant, wakes up as a saint who is destined to defeat absolute evil. She avoids the corrupt priests and chooses to be the adopted daughter of the king's sword, the Marquis, but just because she was born from a humble region she is treated coldly by the priests.

Among them, the affectionate Daniel is their only consolation. However, at the moment when everyone in the aristocracy rejected her, it was not he who reached out, but Esselmund, the successor to the cold and ruthless Marquis.

"You don't need to do anything, Violeta just needs to stand still and blossom into the little flowers and chaos."

title: The adopted daughter-in-law wants to leave
summary:
I possessed the body of the no. 1 villainess, Ellie, who was a terrible person who tormented the Male Lead in the orphanage. I quietly waited until the day that the Duke would pick him up vowed to never get caught up in the novel, so she would not see the ugly ending that the villainess did, until...

"I will also adopt the child next to him too... she will become my daughter-in-law."

I was adopted along with the Male Lead! I can’t just do this? There’s a separate heroine!

---
I have possessed the extremely cruel villainess who tormented the male lead during his childhood days in the orphanage.

To change my fate, I decided “Just don’t do that,” but the pitiful boy kept getting beaten up by the other kids anyway, so I had to keep an eye on him even more!

Then one day, his father's best friend the Duke, who had been searching for the male lead for 10 years, finally found the orphanage. 

“I'll adopt this child here. Oh, and the child next to him too.”

Wait, why am I also getting adopted?!

He wants me as his daughter-in-law for the male lead?!? 

What about the female lead??

—

Just like in the original novel, the male lead joined his adoptive father in the war. 

He was supposed to return from the battlefield with the female lead, so I carefully prepared for a divorce and made a lot of money so I can live by myself! But…

“Damian, did you come home alone? Did no one else come with you?”

“Someone else?” Upon hearing my question, Damian’s gaze suddenly sharpened.

“Ellie. are you looking for a man other than your husband?” 

“Huh?”

“That's no good, I would probably kill that man out of jealousy.”

I looked over to my father-in-law for help.

“I also agree, Ellie. You shouldn’t betray your husband ever...”

title: The Cotton Candy Lady’s Candy Shop
Magic Academy’s Genius Blinker
summary:
A character with extreme difficulty and the worst performance, Baek Yu-Seol was considered tr*sh in the game because he couldn’t use magic in a fantasy world where everyone else could.

However…

[Due to the wrong ending, 90% of Aether World has been destroyed.] [Please reach the ‘True Ending.’]
Suddenly, those words echoed in my mind before I was transmigrated to the Aether World.

[You can use the skill ‘Flash’.]
“Why did I possess this character?”

Flash was the only magic skill I was given.

Surviving in Stella Academy where many genius mages ran rampant, I became the notorious Flash Mage.

title: Artifact-Devouring Player
The Fox-Eyed Villain of the Demon Academy
summary:
The very last moment before the novel was about the end, the strongest villain met a pitiful fate.

But that wasn't the end.

"So, this is how I die."

I, who was once the author, woke up as the fox-eyed villian who was never once understood.

A fallen family. A life thrown away for revenge. A future sealed in tragedy.

I'm going to rewrite it all.

This villain's end... will be reversed.

title: Academy’s Genius Swordmaster
summary:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

title: Alien Abyss: Restart Era
summary: Yongsheng is an orphan who grew up in the Dream City, relying on the kindness of others. After his home was destroyed and those closest to him were devastated, he discovered the truth of the world. Guided by Mu Qing, he awakens a hidden power. To prevent further harm and protect those he cherishes, he joins the "Exterminators" and embarks on a path of resistance. Gradually, he begins to recover his lost memories, breaking through the darkness' rule time and again, ultimately leading humanity to freedom.

title: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
summary:
Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. 

But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

title: I Became a Dead Character in a Prison for Wastes
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel… but, hey… What am I supposed to do if I reincarnate in 10 years before the novel begins?

The location: prison. The problem is that even a jungle is better than this place!

After ten years finally passed, I became the top dog in this prison. 

*
“Hey Mint. Cut it out. Don’t go overboard.”

“I have no idea what you’re talking about.”

I became a good-for-nothing leader, but I’m fine with that. That’s a privilege a pro gets. 

“I’ll make you dead on paper, so do me one last favour.”
“I have no idea what you’re on about.”

A golden opportunity was bestowed upon me. 

“If you help me, I’ll release you from prison.”
“What do you want me to do, Master?”
“...”

The chief of the prison asked me, the psycho of the prison, for a favor.

“Make the new guy coming into the leader of this prison.”

It may be called a prison, but in reality, it’s a lawless place. If I can make one man into the leader, I can finally be released.

“But to do that, you need to enter a male prison.”
“...Huh? How can I attach something that’s not there and get in?”

But oh god? The new guy is the male lead of the original novel.

title: Rosemary’s Fairy Tales
My Little Brother Is The Academy’s Hotshot
The Great Mage Returns After 4000 Years
summary:
Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.

---

title: The Cold President’s Little Cutie
summary:
My mom is the naive and sweet protagonist in a tragic romance novel. My mom is also the substitute lover who escaped from the overbearing President. And I? Well, I'm the five-year-old genius hacker.

Gu Chu, a brilliant hacker, finds herself reborn in a tragic romance novel as a five-year-old cutie. Her mother is the unfortunate heroine, her father is the blind-to-reality President, and they're surrounded by scheming relatives, a two-faced aunt, and various villainous women.

Determined to protect her mother, little Gu Chu stands tall and begins to fight back. What harm could a five-year-old possibly cause? She just wants to protect her mommy and maybe inherit her President daddy's billions along the way.

title: I’m a Saintess, But I Refuse to Work!
Food Truck Owner Inside the Dungeon
summary:
"Don't yearn for a world different from yours, just live a normal life."

Hunters, dungeons, I'm not interested in any of them.
My life followed one single path that's of cooking.
But the moment I was about to open my first long-awaited food truck....

[Class: You have awakened as a Food Truck Owner (Hidden)!]
[Item: Dungeon Business Permit (Personal/Non-Transferable)!]
- Business is only possible inside the dungeon

Min Jiun, 21 years old, awakened as the owner of a food truck inside the dungeon.

title: Keep A Low Profile, Sect Leader
summary:
Traveling to the world of Tian Xuan, can’t believe I’ve become a useless sect’s leader!

Paying money in the city to be reborn in a game’s realm.

Making the players my workers, collecting the main characters from the world as my underlings.

If we’re talking about being pretentious, then I’ll only take the number one spot!

title: Murim Login
summary:
Large numbers of monsters come out the gate which is the boundary of the world. After many sacrifices, People won the fight against monsters through their awakening. Jin Taekyung is alive as an 'F class hunter' which is the lowest level. After Jin has a hard time, he gets an old capsule then he goes into the capsule that is the martial heroes' world. And the game system gives him special abilities, he starts growing up to become the best martial hero.  

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8%EC%9D%B8-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC/2384)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11042/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/55123)

title: Worn and Torn Newbie
summary:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?

title: The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student
summary:
Back in the Age of Despair, Kyle defeated Erebos, the genesis of evil.  Then 5000 years later, he reincarnated as Leo with the memories of his past life intact.

His comrades — the Brave Arron, the Divine Blacksmitsh Dweno, the Poet of the Stars Luna, and the Wise King Lysinas — were all heralded as great heroes.

But the 'Hero Record', a gift from the heavens that records the achievements of heroes through the ages, had no record of Kyle whatsoever, and the people of the present treat him like a fictional character.

Angry about the reality he's found himself in, Leo enrolls at Lumene Academy, the hero academy which houses the Hero Record.

"Fine. I guess I'll become an honors student to figure out why I was written out of history."

title: I Became the Successor of the Martial God
summary: One day, I suddenly became the protagonist of a game. However, the more you look at this protagonist... the more you'll sigh. He's got the worst stats, the worst talent and zero connections. But still… You have acquired [Heavenly Martial Physique]. You have become the master of the [Martial God's Tome]. “So what? I’m the ultimate veteran player!” He's not just a veteran player— he’s a full-blown obsessive maniac. Thus begins the legendary playthrough of a hardcore veteran!

title: Swordmaster’s Youngest Son
summary:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

title: Imperial Maid
summary:
"Common features, the illegitimate child of a self-proclaimed author."
 
Leona, a maid who rose to power with her exceptional intelligence despite lacking a prestigious background.
 
But when the empire, which she thought would be eternal, crumbled under the enemy's invasion, she too met her death by the enemy's sword.
 
A life filled with greed, harming others, and engaging in cunning schemes.
Her life was filled with regret, so death was welcome...
 
But she returned.
Back to the time when she first entered the palace as a maid.
 
This is definitely a chance to correct the mistakes of her past life.
 
"This time, I will live a life of protecting and nurturing, not harming and taking from others."
 
Choosing the Crown Prince, her political enemy from her past life whom she had dethroned, as the key to changing this life, she served as a maid, and everything seemed to be going well...
 
"Leona, let's leave this place together."
 
Something seems wrong.
 
The secrets of the Crown Prince, who she thought was cold and indifferent, and the truth hidden from the world are revealed, and the shadow of destruction falls upon the empire.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: I Need to Raise My Sister Properly
summary:
Her favorite character's fate is in her hands.
A woman's dream comes true when she transmigrates into the body of Rachel Agnes, sister of Liz Agnes — her favorite story villain. Her mission? Ensure that Liz goes down a better path. Yet, things become more complicated than expected, especially when a notorious archduke is thrown into the mix...

title: Seoul Station Druid
summary:
What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth, transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world, but one day, just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet, Suho is pulled back to Earth!

 He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible, as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.

How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth, and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3367)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001631)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/the-druid-of-seoul-station/list?title_no=3642)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3586)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)

title: The Housekeeper in the Dungeon
summary: Kiska, a boy who was mistreated by the villagers, was able to get by thanks to his childhood friend, Namia, who was the only one who stood by him. One day, Namia is found murdered in the village. Kiska is framed for the murder by the other villagers, and banished to an inescapable S-class dungeon...?

title: I’m Done Being a Hero, Even If It’s Retirement
summary: Everyone's shocked when 9-year-old prodigy Adelia Ester suddenly refuses to enroll in the elite knights' academy. They don't know that Adelia was magically sent back in time after wasting her life on the battlefield and suffering an early death! Now, Adelia's out to protect her peace from her ex-boss, the evil future emperor, by setting her ally on the throne instead. Will Adelia succeed in one last mission and finally retire for good? Or will she find herself forced to be a hero once more?

title: Deadlines are Raining in the Status Window
summary: A masterpiece of over 3,000 volumes, I was incarnated into “Dawn of Repentance.” Moreover, as the successor to the duke’s family, facing a grim fate, I became my cherished character, “Mitchell Nephtis.” But upon opening the status window, the countdown to death was D-3. With the thought that I couldn’t die like this, I somehow managed to survive, and each time I changed the development, experience points were granted?! If that’s the case, I’ll change the original storyline drastically to reap the benefits. Leaving the deceased “Michell Nephtys” aside, I lived as the nanny’s daughter, “Evan Laeff,” doing as told, but missions kept pouring in on the status window, and failure meant death. Now that it’s like this, whether the storyline changes or not doesn’t matter. I will definitely survive and prevail

title: Villainess with a 0% Survival Rate
summary:
If you make the wrong choice, you will die instantly! The worst Otome game ever with death is about to begin!

One day, the protagonist receives an email from her former best friend saying, “I finished developing the game we used to make together, and I’d like for you to play it.” However, the day after playing the game, she wakes up and finds herself as “Diana,” the villainess of the game! Moreover, she has entered the “extra mode,” in which Diana is the heroine! In this mode, her favorability with the male characters starts in the negatives, all of them seem to resent Diana.

Can Diana survive this game of death?

title: White Moon He Made a Move On Me
summary: A sassy, drop-dead gorgeous heiress clashes with the refined, high-and-mighty CEO, Mr. Bao Jinlan. Jiang Yaoyao had a secret crush on Bao Jinlan for ages, being super cautious and discreet about it, until one day, she woke up in a hotel room with him sleeping right next to her... And then, she somehow became Bao Jinlan's fiancée. Nobody dared to mess with her in the Jiang family anymore, and the big shots in the city's social scene respected her to no end. Everywhere she went, the youngsters would call her 'Big Sis,' and Mr. Bao? Well, he suddenly got addicted to being around her.

title: Tamed the Monster Prince
summary: The 27-year-old Sei Shonagon, depicted here as a sort of medieval NEET, manages to land a job as the private tutor of a beautiful and refined 13-year-old, Princess Teishi. There are also a number of other quirky court ladies, some of whom have their eyes on Shonagon.

title: When The Count’s Illegitimate Daughter Gets Married
summary:
As an illegitimate child, Laritte’s biggest sin was being born. In the year she became an adult, she was sent to marry the ghost duke who was rumored to be dead. Her miserable life seemed to get worse and worse, however… Her life changed when the duke came back alive.

“Madam, how do you like it?”
“You have enough luxury to buy some residences in the capital.”
“…no one will be able to look down on you anymore.”

Kind servants and the empire’s devoted and murderous duke. It was already too late for those who tormented Laritte in the past to regret their actions.
